product_name: Aquaglide Rogue XP One Inflatable Kayak
long_description: Ideal for fishing, diving and all around recreational use, this wide, stable inflatable boat has an open stern for re-boarding from the water while its open cockpit facilitates fast drainage.
short_description: Ideal for fishing, diving and all around recreational use, this wide, stable inflatable boat has an open stern for re-boarding from the water while its open cockpit facilitates fast drainage.
